opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 15th day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and this matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for further proceedings in light of Taylor v. Extendicare Health Facilities, Inc., et al., 637 Pa. 163, 147 A.3d 490 (2016).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
